attributes.action: to STOP building the prison in our local area of Runwell, Rettendon and Wickford and build it on the brown land sites available.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is against the Government’s proposed plan to build up prison in the near vicinity of Wickford, Rettendon and Runwell which would hold 1500 inmates. Our town needs regeneration, not a prison on our doorstep. There are plenty of brown sites available - build it there!
Please sign the petition and say NO to a prison in Wickord. Say NO to prisons on your doorstep.
